title: right now games feel like the preseason.
body: remember when every game used to be either your 30 kills ahead or 30 kills behind. its starting to feel the same way again. maybe its always been like that but i win and am unstoppable the enemy wins and you can't even team fight under your own turrets.

replies.body: i just wish towers did damage

If towers actually did damage like you are thinking, the games would never end.

The issue is not with the towers, or the team fights, or the late game rampages.

It is the balancing, early game and snowballing.

It is too easy to play the right way and snowball and win. But too many players, especially at low rank try and be heros, fail, let the enemy snowball and than come here to complain it is one sided.
